metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12396 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mozilla developers and community members reported memory safety bugspresent in Firefox 75. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox <76.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12396` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '76.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
